exceptions.tactic: intros A T r f e x n H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7.

Found no subterm matching "f x" in the current goal.
The reference H5 was not found in the current environment.

In environment X2, X1, X0, X : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> Prop A : Set T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A e, x : Map A n : nat H1 : increasing_app A r f H2 : T x H3 : f x = x H0 : T e H4 : forall x : Map A, T x -> r e x Unable to unify "r e ?M3337" with "r ((fix power (A : Set) (f : A -> A) (x : A) (n : nat) {struct n} : A := match n with | 0 => x | S n0 => f (power A f x n0) end) (Map A) f e n) (M0 A)".

original: intros A T r f e x n H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. unfold power. unfold mini in H1. unfold fix_point in H2. unfold increasing_app in H3. rewrite H2. rewrite H3. apply H5. apply H1. apply H4.
